identity.title: Determining When to Buy a New Phone (Case 2)

content.prompt:
Construct a program that determines whether it is time to buy a new phone based on the inputs that it receives from the user. A new phone should be bought in either of the following cases:
the phone breaks
the screen has a problem
the phone has the random shutdown problem
